history.proof: intros d0 d1 H. unfold predta_compatible, dta_compat in *. intros s0 s1 H0 H1. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment d0, d1 : preDTA H : forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 s0, s1 : state H0, H1 : ad Unable to unify "state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1" with "MapGet state d0 H0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 H1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1

Premises:
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
preDTA = Map state : Set
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
dta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => predta_compatible p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
DTA_compat = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => dta_compat p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
pl_tl_length_rec_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (H : pl_tl_length pl 0) (H0 : liste_reconnait d pl tl) => let H1 : pl = pl -> 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl := match H in (pl_tl_length p n) return (p = pl -> n = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) with | pl_tl_O => fun (H1 : prec_empty = pl) (H2 : 0 = 0) => (fun H3 : prec_empty = pl => let H4 : prec_empty = pl := H3 in eq_ind prec_empty (fun _ : prec_list => 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) (fun _ : 0 = 0 => let H6 : liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl := eq_ind_r (fun pl0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d pl0 tl) H0 H3 in let H7 : d = d -> prec_empty = prec_empty -> tl = tl -> 0 = lst_length...
pl_tl_length_rec_1 : forall d : preDTA, pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d prec_empty tnil
rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil
semantic_equiv_1_2 : forall d : preDTA, pre_reconnait d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
term_term_list_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
Z.le_ind : forall A : Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : Z, A n -> (forall m : Z, (n <= m)%Z -> A m -> A (Z.succ m)) -> forall m : Z, (n <= m)%Z -> A m
Pos.peano_rect : forall P : positive -> Type, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
Pos.peano_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
term_list_ind : forall P : term_list -> Prop, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
semantic_equiv_0_7 : forall t : term, sem_equiv_prop_t t -> forall t0 : term_list, sem_equiv_prop_l t0 -> sem_equiv_prop_l (tcons t t0)
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
ltof : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> A -> A -> Prop
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
term_ind : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t
Z.bi_induction : forall P : Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq iff) P -> P 0%Z -> (forall x : Z, P x <-> P (Z.succ x)) -> forall z : Z, P z
MapPut1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> ad -> A -> positive -> Map A
MapPut : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> A -> Map A
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
Eqdep_dec.inj_right_pair_on : forall (A : Type) (x : A), (forall y : A, x = y \/ x <> y) -> forall (P : A -> Prop) (y y' : P x), ex_intro P x y = ex_intro P x y' -> y = y'
Eqdep_dec.inj_right_pair : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, x = y \/ x <> y) -> forall (x : A) (P : A -> Prop) (y y' : P x), ex_intro P x y = ex_intro P x y' -> y = y'
MapCard : forall A : Type, Map A -> nat
pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall n : nat, pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 n -> pl_tl_length pl (S n) -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> S n = lst_length tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
Inductive Zdivide_pol (x : Z) : RingMicromega.PolC Z -> Prop := Zdiv_Pc : forall c : Z, (x | c)%Z -> ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol x (EnvRing.Pc c) | Zdiv_Pinj : forall p : RingMicromega.PolC Z, ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol x p -> forall j : positive, ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol x (EnvRing.Pinj j p) | Zdiv_PX : forall p q : RingMicromega.PolC Z, ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol x p -> ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol x q -> forall j : positive, ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol x (EnvRing.PX p j q) For Zdivide_pol: Argument scopes are [Z_scope _] For Zdiv_Pc: Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope _] For Zdiv_Pinj: Argument scopes are [Z_scope _ _ positive_scope] For Zdiv_PX: Argument scopes are [Z_scope _ _ _ _ positive_scope]

```  
intros d0 d1 H. unfold predta_compatible, dta_compat in *. intros s0 s1 H0 H1.
apply H with (s0:=s0) (s1:=s1); assumption.
```

original: intros d0 d1 H. unfold predta_compatible, dta_compat in *. intros s0 s1 H0 H1. apply H with (s0:=s0) (s1:=s1); auto.
